translation: Good afternoon, everyone!
transcript: 额大家下午好！

translation: I'm Luo Tao from the PaddlePaddle Team.
transcript: 我是来自PaddlePaddle团队的骆涛。

translation: Today, let me introduce Baidu's large-scale distributed deep learning framework - PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 额今天就由我来给大家介绍一下百度的大规模分布式深度学习框架PaddlePaddle。

translation: Usually, AI developers have a preferred framework, so PaddlePaddle is very important to Baidu.
transcript: 对于AI开发者来说，通常都会有一个自己额比较偏好的框架，那么PaddlePaddle对于百度的重要性来说是非常高的。

translation: PaddlePaddle is to Baidu what TensorFlow is to Google, and Caffe2 to Facebook.
transcript: PaddlePaddle对于百度来说就像TensorFlow对于谷歌、额Caffe2对于facebook一样。

translation: It is a framework that Baidu strongly supports and fully promotes.
transcript: 都是公司大力支持和全面推广的一个框架。

translation: PaddlePaddle framework was first established in 2013, and then used for Baidu's deep learning application and research.
transcript: PaddlePaddle这个框架最早成立于2013年，额然后是服务于百度的内部深度学习应用和研究。

translation: After three years of development, it was open-sourced in September 2016,  and now it has been open-sourced for one years and two months.
transcript: 那么在三年的发展之后，它于2016年9月开源，到目前为止，开源两年额一年零两个月。

translation: Now, the company attaches great importance to our PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 额现在公司对我们PaddlePaddle是非常重视的。

translation: Mr. Lu Qi, our COO, has stressed in many occasions that all machine learning and deep learning platforms of our company should be unified into PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 我们的COO陆奇先生，就在多个场合都强调过，公司所有的机器学习和深度学习平台都要统一到PaddlePaddle。

translation: The business platform should be fully transferred to PaddlePaddle, and the technology platform should be shared to PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 其中业务平台要全面地迁移到PaddlePaddle，技额技术平台要贡献到PaddlePaddle。

translation: As developers working at the frontline of the platform, we're under huge pressure.
transcript: 这样对于在一线研发的我们来说，压力是非常大的。

translation: We need to make PaddlePaddle as good as possible, so the platform could better support the needs from various applications within the company.
transcript: 我们是要把PaddlePaddle做的尽可能的好，才能更好地支持公司内部的各个应用需求。

translation: In addition, many people have asked us whether Baidu has an internal version of PaddlePaddle that is different from the public version.
transcript: 额另外很多人都问过我们，PaddlePaddle是不是在百度有一个内部版本和外面的版本是不一样的。

translation: Here, I can tell you that PaddlePaddle does not have an internal version.
transcript: 额这里我可以告诉大家PaddlePaddle没有内部版本。

translation: We also use the public version on GitHub, an open source community.
transcript: 额内部和外部都使用开源社区GitHub上的版本。

translation: Therefore, please feel free to use PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 因此请大家可以放心大胆地来使用PaddlePaddle。

translation: We have the determination as well as the ability to make it an excellent platform, and we will never hide anything for our own good.
transcript: 我们有决心也有能力把它做好并且绝不会藏私。

translation: For PaddlePaddle, we are building it into the best deep learning platform in China, that's our short-term goal.
transcript: 额PaddlePaddle呢，短期目标是成为国内最好的深度学习平台。

translation: Our medium and long-term goal is to compete with the world top deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and Caffe2.
transcript: 我们的中长期目标是能和世界范围内的顶级深度学习框架如TensorFlow和Caffe2一较高下。

translation: The opening of PaddlePaddle is actually an opening of four major elements of the development of artificial intelligence technology, including framework, large-scale computing, big data and applications.
transcript: 额PaddlePaddle的开放，额是人工智能技术开发的四大要素的开放，包括框架、大规模计算、大数据和应用。

translation: First, I'll talk about the framework.
transcript: 额，首先来讲一下框架。

translation: Framework is the core element, which defines the whole process of deep learning, including data preparation, model training, prediction and deployment.
transcript: 框架是核心要素，它定义了一个深度学习是如何从数据准备、模型训练、预测到部署的。

translation: The framework of PaddlePaddle are being continuously optimized and improved.
transcript: 然后，PaddlePaddle这个框架正在不断地优化和改进中。

translation: At present, we are refactoring PaddlePaddle, trying to present a more user-friendly and more efficient framework for users.
transcript: 我们目前在对PaddlePaddle做重构，力求给用户呈现一个更加友好、更加高效的框架。

translation: PaddlePaddle will be combined with cloud computing technology, through which, we hope that developers can enjoy Baidu's large-scale computing capability, then ordinary developers can also conduct large-scale model training.
transcript: PaddlePaddle会和云计算技术相结合，额能希望能给开发者带来嗯希望能给开发者能享受到百度的大规模的计算能力，从而使普通的开发者，也能在也能训练的大规模额也能进行大规模的模型训练。

translation: The third element is open data.
transcript: 额第三个是数据的开放。

translation: We know that data is crucial for machine learning and deep learning, sometimes even more important than model itself.
transcript: 额我们知道对于机器学习和深度学习来说，数据是非常重要的，有的时候比模型本身更加重要。

translation: Therefore, we will work with our partners to open some data that was inaccessible before.
transcript: 因此我们会和我们的合作方一起，来为大家免费开放出一批以前接触不到的数据。

translation: Developers will be able to use the data for free.
transcript: 这些数据都会全面免费地给开发者使用。

translation: The fourth element is large-scale application.
transcript: 第四个是大应用。

translation: Large-scale application means industrial-level application.
transcript: 这里所谓的大应用指的是工业级的应用。

translation: We will open some model configurations for scenarios frequently using deep learning.
transcript: 我们会针对深度学习的一些高频额应用场景。

translation: Even, we will train some models, and put them on the platform so that users could use their own data to deliver applications they want.
transcript: 然后开放出一批模型配置，甚至对于某些模型我们会训练出模型放在平台上面，让用户可以用自己的数据，来训练出自己的想要的应用，

translation: In this way, the R&D of AI technology will be accelerated.
transcript: 从而来加速AI技术的研发。

translation: First, I'll introduce the open application model library of PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 额首先来讲一下PaddlePaddle的开放应用模型库。

translation: We can see that there's a repo called models maintained under the official path of PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 我们可以看到在PaddlePaddle的官方路径下面维护着一个叫models的repo。

translation: Here we've stored some frequently used deep learning models, for example, the CTR prediction and learning-to-rank models in the first line.
transcript: 这里会放着一些常用的深度学习模型。额，比如说第一行的点击率预估和learning-to-rank。

translation: The CTR prediction model evaluates the reach rate, while the learning-to-rank model ranks search results.
transcript: 点击率预估评估的是呈现给用户的广告率，而learnlearning-to-rank它是对搜索结果进行排序。

translation: Both models are relevant to Baidu's core revenue business.
transcript: 这两个模型都是和百度的核心营收业务相关的。

translation: Please look at the ASR in the second line.
transcript: 那么第二行的语音识别。

translation: The ASR Project was developed based on a speech recognition project initiated by Andrew Ng when he was in Baidu.
transcript: 语音识别项目原来是由吴恩达先生在百度领导的一个语音项目额语音识别项目发展而成的。

translation: This project achieves pretty good recognition rate even in noisy scenario.
transcript: 这个项目是在噪声的环境下也会有不错的识别率，

translation: Now, we've open-sourced it.
transcript: 我们现在把它做了开源。

translation: We hope users could use the model to train their own ASR models.
transcript: 额我们希望用户能用到的能使用这个模型来进行自己的语音模额语音识别模型的训练。

translation: At the same time, we will train a good model with tens of thousand of hours of voice data in Chinese and English and open.
transcript: 同时我们也会拿上万小时的数据，额包括中文和英文的语音数据来训练出一个不错的模型放在上面，供用户来使用。

translation: As for this ASR project, we plan to make it independent from the repo of models, and to promote and maintain it as an independent project.
transcript: 额关于这个语音识别项目，我们后期计划把它从models的Repo中独立出来，作为一个单独的项目来进行推广和维护。

translation: In the third line, we can see some applications of text processing, including text classification, text generation and machine translation.
transcript: 那么在第三行中，我们看到的主要是，额文本方面的应用，包括文本分类、文本额生成和机器翻译。

translation: Applications of text-processing have always been one of PaddlePaddle’s advantages.
transcript: 在文本方面的一些应用，一直都是PaddlePaddle强项。

translation: Because Baidu has quite a lot text-related business.
transcript: 这是因为百度在文本方面的业务比较多。

translation: Therefore, PaddlePaddle has always been performing outstandingly in sequence-to-sequence learning.
transcript: 因此PaddlePaddle在序列到序列的学习这个任务上一直表现得非常强。

translation: PaddlePaddle will have specific optimization for some common RNN units, including LSTM, GRU and dual-way structure.
transcript: 额对于常用的一些RNN的单元，包括LSTM、GRU、双向结构等，PaddlePaddle都会有专门的优化实现。

translation: PaddlePaddle also supports nested two-layer RNN structure, thus it’s able to support more complex text structures.
transcript: 而额此外PaddlePaddle还支持嵌套的双层RNN结构，能支持更加复杂的文本结构。

translation: In addition, our RNN adopts a computing method without padding, so its computing power is one to two times stronger than that of TensorFlow.
transcript: 额，另外我们RNN采用的是无padding的计算方式，因此它的计算性能是TensorFlow的一到两倍。

translation: For more details, you can visit our benchmark on Github, where we’ve posted a chart of performance comparison.
transcript: 具体可以看我们的Github上的benchmark，我们在那会放了性能的对比图。

translation: We opened those models for we hope that when users are training or designing their deep learning algorithms, they could go to our Repo and find similar applications.
transcript: 额我们开放出这些模型，主要是希望用户在额训练他们的，训练和设计他们的深度学习算法的时候，会来我们这个Repo来寻找相似的应用。

translation: Thus, they only need to prepare their own data and modify models slightly, next they could train models rapidly, then start iterative  development and speed up application.
transcript: 额从而他们只要准备好自己的数据，然后对模型做一些少量的修改，就可以快速地进行模型的训练，然后来进行迭代开发、加速应用。

translation: For text classification and image detection, my fellow colleague Mr. Zhao Chengduo will bring us a workshop for demonstration.
transcript: 额那么关于文本分类和图像检测，待会儿我的同事赵成舵会给大家带来一个workshop来进行演示。

translation: Many applications of models are inspired by Baidu's lines of business or prototype algorithms in some academic theses.
transcript: models中的应用很多都来自于百度的真实业务线，或者是一些学术论文中的原型额原型算法。

translation: We're glad to see that some developers have managed to make a difference by using PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 那么我们很高兴地看到有一些开发者已经用PaddlePaddle来做出一些非常有意义和有价值的事情。

translation: This is an intelligent peach sorter for peach farmers, which is invented by some undergraduates from Beijing University of Technology.
transcript: 这里给大家展示的是北京工业大学的几个本科生利用PaddlePaddle做的智能桃子分拣器，为桃农来分拣桃子。

translation: Let's watch a video first.
transcript: 额首先我们来看一段视频。

translation: Play the video, please.
transcript: 请导播放一下视频。

translation: My family has been growing peach trees since my grandfather.
transcript: 祖辈儿是三辈儿的都搞这个桃子。

translation: In busy seasons, we can't handle all of the trees and have to hire some part-time workers.
transcript: 忙的时候，我们公母俩也忙不过来，请点儿这个外来打工的。

translation: They are less-experienced, so they could just do some auxiliary work.
transcript: 他们好些经验就不足，只能做点儿辅助的。

translation: When talking with peach farmers, we realized that they always put too many efforts in the classification process.
transcript: 哦我们在跟桃农在交流的过程中也了解到，桃农在分类过程中会投入很大的精力。

translation: We learned from the news that Baidu's AFR technologies are pretty cool, so we decided to develop an auomatic peach recognizer.
transcript: 我们之前在新闻上了解到，百度的这个人脸识别还是很炫酷的，所以我们就联想到想做一个“桃脸识别”。

translation: We're familiar with mechanical control, but the deep learning stuff seemed formidable to us.
transcript: 因为我们是比较懂机械控制，但是对深度学习还是比较畏惧的。

translation: So we searched on the Internet and found that PaddlePaddle could meet our demands.
transcript: 我们就在网上搜索了解到百度的这个PaddlePaddle其实很符合我们的要求。

translation: Through learning the tutotrials on the open source platform PaddlePaddle, we trained our own model and used it for peach sorting.
transcript: 按照开源平台PaddlePaddle的教程，我们训练了自己的模型，然后进行了分类，

translation: However, the accuracy rate of our sorting was a bit low.
transcript: 但我们分类的准确率比较低。

translation: We put forward this problem on GitHub and got some help from PaddlePaddle Community, achieving a great result.
transcript: 我们在GitHub上提出了这个问题，得到了PaddlePaddle社区人员的帮助，取得了很好的效果。

translation: The whole device comprises four parts: conveyor, a pushing and pulling device, control circuit, and a mainframe.
transcript: 整个装置主要包含四个部分：传送带、推拉装置、控制电路和一个电脑主机。

translation: The mainframe is for running PaddlePaddle’s algorithms.
transcript: 电脑主机主要用来运行额PaddlePaddle的算法。

translation: After properly trained, the elements that the image classification algorithm can extract are much more rich and comprehensive than that from manual classification.
transcript: 图形分类算法经过训练后，可以提取的要素要比人工分类的依据更加丰富和全面。

translation: The more training the machine gets, the more data are accumulated, the more accurate the sorting and classifying will be.
transcript: 机器训练的越多，积累的数据也越多，分级和分类的结果也会更加准确。

translation: Over these years, we have seen that some high technologies have been used in traditional industries, which could solve many practical problems.
transcript: 经过这些时间，我们看到就是已经现有一些高新的一些技术已经能和传统的行业结合在一起，解决很多的实际问题。

translation: We hope that this new technology could be applied in Kenya to help farmers with smart sorting of vegetables and fruits.
transcript: 希望这新技术也能用在我们国家肯尼亚帮助农民实现更多果蔬的智能分类。

translation: The peach sorter invented by Beijing University of Technology could lower labor cost.
transcript: 工大他们研究的这个分装机，解决我们劳动力。

translation: We used to sort peaches by hand, now we can use machine to do the heavy work, it really helps us a lot.
transcript: 要不我们用手工来操作大中小，现在呢用机器化来分辨，这可太好了，这个对我们的帮助很大。

translation: What will they invent in the future?
transcript: 将来就是他们研制出什么呢？

translation: Automatic picking robots, packaging robots, which will help us a lot more in the future.
transcript: 机器人儿摘桃，机器人儿分装，那对我们老百姓说更好。

translation: That’s all of the video.
transcript: 额我们这段视频看完了。

translation: This is a typical example of how AI changes a traditional industry.
transcript: 这就是一个AI改变传统行业的一个典型的例子。

translation: From this video, we see that the undergraduates from Beijing University of Technology utilized PaddlePaddle and brought actual benefits to peach farmers, letting people in the traditional industries gain from the development of AI.
transcript: 我们从这个视频中可以看到，额PaddlePaddle，额那个北京工业大学的本科生利用PaddlePaddle，真真正正地为桃农带来了实惠，让传统的一些行业的额从业者从AI的发展浪涛中受到了实惠。

translation: As for these students from Beijing University of Technology, they don't have any background in deep learning.
transcript: 额对于传统，额对于北京工业大学这些学生来说，他们是没有深度学习的任何背景的。

translation: They don't know much about image classification, what they are good at is mechanical control.
transcript: 他们是不会图像分类，然后他们所擅长的领域是机械控制。

translation: For professional AI developers, what they see is probably just an image, a simple image classification problem.
transcript: 那么对于AI的专业研发者来说，他们看到的可能就是一个图像，简单的图像分类问题。

translation: However, it's very hard for these undergraduates.
transcript: 但是对于这几个本科生来说，这是非常难的。

translation: But by using PaddlePaddle they could quickly train an image classifier, which tells whether a peach is of good or bad quality.
transcript: 而他们利用PaddlePaddle就可以很快速地训练出一个图像分类器，然后用这个分类器来分拣桃子品质的好坏。

translation: Then they could focus on mechanical control that they're good at, and integrate technologies on PaddlePaddle into their device.
transcript: 然后他们就可以把他们自己的精力放在他们所擅长的机机械控制的方面，然后最终集成PaddlePaddle的额技术就可以了。

translation: We really appreciate this kind of effort, and we encourage people to do the same.
transcript: 那么我们是额非常额非常非常鼓励这样的事情。

translation: We also help these undergraduages a lot with their research and development.
transcript: 因此我们也在，额这几个本科生的研发过程中，给了他们很多的帮助。

translation: We hope that more people could join us, together we can use AI technology to bring more innovations to traditional industries.
transcript: 我们也希望更多的人能参与到我们额我们中间来，额利用AI技术为传统行业做出更多的改变。

translation: Besides the open application model library mentioned before, we will also open some large-scale data.
transcript: 那么除了前面讲的开放应用模型库之外，我们还会开放一些大规模的数据。

translation: We will work with teams from Baidu and some external partners to open some large-scale data together.
transcript: 我们会和百度内部的团队和外部的一些合作方，一起来开放出一些大规模的数据。

translation: These data includes tens of thousands of hours of voice recognition data we talked about earlier, and some data mentioned in this PPT slides, such as processed traffic data, and some text data from Baidu.
transcript: 这些数据包括前面讲过的上万小时的语音识别数据，还有这个ppt中的一些，额比如处理好的交通数据，还有百度的一些文本文本方面的数据。

translation: We've always been pushing and implementing these plans.
transcript: 这些事情，我们额一直都有在推进。

translation: We hope to build an integrated open platform of algorithms plus computing plus data.
transcript: 我们希望额构建的是一个算法+计算+数据的一体化开放平台。

translation: Through the opening, we hope that ordinary developers could get access to cutting-edge research subjects.
transcript: 通过这样的一种开放，那么我们希望使普通的开发者也能接触到最前沿的课题。

translation: After having models and data, the biggest challenge faced by individual developers, as well as small and medium-sized enterprises, is the lack of computing resources.
transcript: 那么有了模型和数据之后，对于中小额对于个人开发者和中小企业来说，他们面临最大挑战就是计算资源的不足。

translation: Not all developers and small and medium-sized enterprises have the ability to maintain the expensive GPU clusters.
transcript: 并不是所有的开发者和个额中小企业都有能力来维护价格高昂的GPU集群。

translation: A GPU server with four P40 chips costs RMB 200,000, then the maintenance for a cluster of ten GPU servers could cost more than one million RMB.
transcript: 一台插了4块P40卡的GPU服务器就要售价20万人民币，那么维护一个十台GPU机器的集群就要上百万人民币。

translation: PaddlePaddle solves this problem through the combination with Cloud computing technologies.
transcript: 那么PaddlePaddle它是通过和云计算技术的相结合来解决这一问题的。

translation: What we are doing now is to define a Paddle Cloud general computing cluster.
transcript: 我们目前做的一个事情是额定义额做了一个Paddlecloud通用计算集群。

translation: It adopts Kubernetes distributed operation system.
transcript: 它底下是采用的是Kubernetes分布式操作系统。

translation: Via the services on Paddle Cloud, users could prepare data, train models, make predictions and deploy applications.
transcript: 那么通过Paddlecloud我们通过Paddlecloud上的服务，用户就可以来额进行数据准备、模型训练、预测以及应用部署。

translation: It's a one-stop service.
transcript: 就是一额一条龙服务。

translation: Users could imporve their models based on data they obtained, then accelerate the development of AI through continuous iterations.
transcript: 然后用户就可以根据得到的数据来进一步地改进模型，然后不断地迭代来加速AI的研发。

translation: Here I'd like to point out that PaddlePaddle is the first open-sourced deep learning framework that officially supports Kubernetes.
transcript: 额这里要强调一下PaddlePaddle是第一个官方支持Kubernetes的开源深度学习框架。

translation: In the same way, we‘re maintaining a Cloud Repo under the official path of PaddlePaddle, specifically for this general computing cluster.
transcript: 那么同样地我们在PaddlePaddle官方路径下维护了一个CloudRepo，来专门额做这个通用计算集群。

translation: In addition, we've got the National Engineering Laboratory for Deep Learning Technology and Applications.
transcript: 额此外我们还有深度学习技术和应用国家工程实验室。

translation: The laboratory was established in Baidu early this year.
transcript: 这个实验室于今年年初落户百度。

translation: Led by Baidu, the laboratory was built in collaboration with Tsinghua University and Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
transcript: 它是由百度牵头和清华、北航等单位共建。

translation: This means a recognition at the country level for Baidu’ efforts in deep learning.
transcript: 这个是国家层面对于百度在深度学习技术上的高度认可。

translation: So this platform needs to open deep learning technology, algorithms, hardware, data, models and so on.
transcript: 那么这个平台就需要对深度学习、算法、硬件、数据、模型等的开放。

translation: Meanwhile, the only deep learning framework supported by this platform is PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 同时这个平台所支持的唯一的深度学习框架就是PaddlePaddle。

translation: I've mentioned the opening of four elements of PaddlePaddle before.
transcript: 前面我们讲了PaddlePaddle四大要素的开放。

translation: They will be available on the platform simultaneously.
transcript: 都会在这个平台上予以同步开放。

translation: Here we list some important links.
transcript: 额这里我们罗列了一些重要的链接。

translation: The first one links to core codes of PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 第一个链接就是PaddlePaddle的核心代码。

translation: It's a place for our code research and development.
transcript: 额这是我们的主要的代码的研发研发的地方。

translation: The second one, Paddle Cloud general computing cluseter.
transcript: 那么第二个就paddlecloud通用计算集群。

translation: The third one is models, the open application model library.
transcript: 第三个是额models开放应用模型库。

translation: The fourth one is some of our works for mobile terminals, mainly for model prediction acceleration on mobile terminals.
transcript: 第四个是我们的移动端上的一些工作，主要做的是移动端上的模型预测加速。

translation: I am not going into details here.
transcript: 那么我们在这里没有进行展开。

translation: If you're interested, please visit the link to try Paddle Mobile.
transcript: 如果大家有兴趣可以访问这个链接来使用一下paddlemobile。

translation: Your comments are welcomed.
transcript: 如果有意见也可以提给我们。

translation: You guys must be curious about how our PaddlePaddle team work.
transcript: 额大家肯定很关注PaddlePaddle的一些工作模式。

translation: We are quite a special team inside Baidu.
transcript: 我们在百度内部是一个较为特殊的存在。

translation: We work in a different way from other teams, because we are probably the only team in Baidu that focuses on open-sourcing.
transcript: 额我们的工作模式和其它的团队有点不太一样，因为我们可能是百度内部唯一一个专注于开源的团队。

translation: We had a flat organizational structure with little hierarchy.
transcript: 然后我们的嗯组织形式很扁平，然后人员上基本没有明显的层级划分。

translation: We organize people according to tasks.
transcript: 有的只是以额问题问题为中心的对人员的组织。

translation: So this is how we work: if we have an idea, like improving an algorithm or developing a new function, we will post a PR on GitHub for our design document.
transcript: 那么我们通常的一个工作模式是：如果大家有了一个点子可以是额改进一个算法或者是提出一个新的功能，那么首先额就会在GitHub上发出一个关于设计文档的PR。

translation: Then we will invite friends in the community for review and discussion.
transcript: 然后我们会请社区里的朋友，来进行review和讨论。

translation: If the idea is found problematic, unreasonable, or nobody wants to do it, the PR will be closed.
transcript: 如果大家觉得额点子有问题、设计不合理或者没有人愿意做，那么这个PR就会被关闭。

translation: If the idea is agreed to be good, reasonable, and commonly understood, we will proceed to breakdown the work.
transcript: 如果大家觉得点子很棒、设计合理、大家理解一致，那么我们就会对这个点子来进行一下分工。

translation: Normally we will have one or more people on the task.
transcript: 通常我们会有一个或者多个人，来进行额这项工作的研发。

translation: After task assignment, we'll start to code.
transcript: 那么大家分配完任务之后就开始写代码。

translation: Once the coding is completed, we need to merge the codes with our trunk.
transcript: 写完代码之后，那么我们就需要额，把这些代码merge到我们的主干中。

translation: Next we make some pull requests regarding the merge of codes, then invite those who are familiar with this part to review.
transcript: 那么大家就会提出额merge代码的一些pullrequest，提出这些pullrequest之后，就会请熟悉这部分工作的人来进行review。

translation: After reviewers give their comments, the programmer will modify their codes based on the comments until all reviewers have no problem with it, then we could merge the work with the trunk.
transcript: 那么当review的人提出了一些意见之后，那么额这部分的作者就要根据评审的意见来进行修改，直到所有的评审人都没有意见为止，那么我们就可以把这份工作，额来merge到我们的主干中。

translation: We really hope that everyone here could be a contributor to PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 额我们非常希望在座的各位都能成为PaddlePaddle的贡献者。

translation: The smart peach sorter we talked about before is a very good example.
transcript: 前面我们讲的智能桃子分拣器是一个很好的例子。

translation: Besides, when we were working on the ASR project Deep Speech 2, some developers showed great enthusiasm.
transcript: 此外我们在研发DeepSpeech2语音识别项目的时候，就有开发者非常热情。

translation: Each time we opened new codes, they would pull and test them, and give us suggestions.
transcript: 每次我们额开放了新的代码，他都会pull下来，来进行测试，并且给我们提意见。

translation: Sometimes they would even make pull requests to us.
transcript: 有的时候会甚至甚至会主动给我们提pullrequest。

translation: We're very glad to see such developers and encourage what they do.
transcript: 这样的开发者是我们非常额鼓励和高兴看到的。

translation: Besides individuals, developers at the enterprise level are welcome to join us too.
transcript: 那么除了个人的开发者之外，我们还欢迎企业级的开发者。

translation: This July, we had our first enterprise level developer - Intel.
transcript: 今年7月我们迎来了第一个企业级的开发者就是intel。

translation: In AI era, we know that the computing power of GPU is crucial.
transcript: 额在AI时代我们知道GPU的计算能力是非常重要的，

translation: In the wave of AI development, Intel was once at a disadvantage.
transcript: 那么在这场AI发展浪潮中，intel一度是出处于下风的。

translation: But in recent two years they tried to catch up.
transcript: 但他们这两年来额还是有一些发力。

translation: They had some major acquisitions, meanwhile they opened MKL-DNN, a library for accelerating deep learning on CPU.
transcript: 他们有一系列大手笔的收购，同时他们也开放了CPU上的深度学习加速库MKL-DNN。

translation: It's a conterpart of NVIDIA cuDNN.
transcript: 这个库是用来对标NVIDIA的cuDNN库的。

translation: Intel hopes that MKL-DNN could be integrated into the mainstream deep learning frameworks.
transcript: 额intel他是非常希望把这个MKL-DNN库给融合到主流的深度学习框架中。

translation: They tried to integrate the library into Caffe and have also done a lot of optimization work there.
transcript: 之前他们是尝试过把这个库融合到caffe上面，然后他们在caffe上面也做了很多的优化工作。

translation: If you're interested, please search the Intel Caffe Project in GitHub.
transcript: 额有兴趣的人，额有兴趣的在座的各位可以搜索一下GitHub上intelcaffe这个项目。

translation: However, for some reasons, the base was not integrated into Caffe official framework.
transcript: 但是由于一系列的原因，这个这部分工作并没有被caffe额官方框架所融合。

translation: So they came to us this July for cooperation.
transcript: 然后他们于今年7月找到我们，希望和我们进行合作。

translation: Since then, Intel has contributed almost 10,000 lines of codes to us.
transcript: 那么从7月份合作到目前为止，intel已经给我们贡献了将近1万多行代码。

translation: What we achieved through cooperation is that the VGG network trained using MKL-DNN runs three to four times faster on Intel Skylake than the network trained only using MKL.
transcript: 我们目前取得成额目前取得的合作成果是，利用MKL-DNN库训练出来的VGG网络，在intel的skylake这个平台上比之前只使用MKL库的网络要快三到四倍。

translation: For related links you can have a look at our Benchmark.
transcript: 那么相关的链接也可以看我们的Benchmark。

translation: PaddlePaddle is the first deep learning framework that officially supports MKL-DNN.
transcript: 那么PaddlePaddle，它是第一个官方支持MKL-DNN库的深度学习框架。

translation: Our collaboration with Intel has also accelerated some performances of PaddlePaddle on CPU.
transcript: 那么我们和intel的合作也加速了PaddlePaddle在CPU上的一些性能。

translation: Thank you for your attention and support to PaddlePaddle open source community!
transcript: 额非常感谢大家对PaddlePaddle开源社区的关注和支持！

translation: This is a great era, in which the AI technologies develop with each passing day.
transcript: 这是一个很好的时代，AI的技术日新月异。

translation: We hope that everyone here could learn and grow from the development of AI, realizing your own value.
transcript: 我们都希望在座各位能从能从AI发展技术浪潮中获得成长，实现自己价值。

translation: If you are already  using PaddlePaddle, keep going.
transcript: 额如果大家已经在使用PaddlePaddle了，那么请坚持你们的选择。

translation: Your comments are welcomed.
transcript: 嗯如果有意见欢迎提给我们。

translation: If you haven't tried PaddlePaddle yet, please give it a try.
transcript: 如果还未使用PaddlePaddle，请大胆尝试。

translation: I believe you'll benefit a lot from it.
transcript: 额你们必将会受益匪浅。

translation: Above is a general introduction.
transcript: 那么上面是一个比较概要性的介绍。

translation: How about the application cases of the open model library?
transcript: 如何使用开放模型库中的一些应用案例呢？

translation: Next we will have my collegue Zhao Chengduo to give us an introduction.
transcript: 下面我们就会请我的同事赵成舵来给大家额介绍一下。

translation: It's your time, Chengduo.
transcript: 额下面时间交给成舵。

translation: Welcome Chengduo!
transcript: 欢迎成舵！
